item.title: ::cat
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

try this… i just acually finished my pet thing to prevent spawning more than one not long ago
first declare this boolean somewhere in client file

public boolean haspet = false;

now that will be (since each time they login the pet wont be there) it will tell the system the person has no pet.

now for the code
Try using this code instead of your current

	if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("cat")) {
	if(haspet == false) {
            SpawnPet(3507);
            sM("You spawned a Cat!");
	    haspet = true;
	} else if(haspet = true) {
	    sM("Sorry, you already have a pet");
	}
	}

that is a code (edited with my base but im familiar with delta) and it should work. If not jsut PM me, it emails my phone and ill hop on from there if im awake…

Read full topic
